text:
Emerging Mathematical Ideas

Connect and build on prior work with operations, estimation, whole numbers, fractions, and decimals to find quotients.

Recognize:

  • the connection between renaming fractions as decimals and finding quotients.
  • how ideas about whole number division connect to dividing decimal numbers.
  • patterns used to determine if a fraction will have a decimal representation that terminates or repeats.

NWDYK

How can you predict which fractions have terminating decimal representations? Repeating decimals representations?
